trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
Gets the control type for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 대 한 컨트롤 형식을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
Gets a collection of child elements.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
A collection of child elements.
Gets the name of the class that defines the type that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 과 관련 된 형식을 정의 하는 클래스의 이름을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
A string that contains "ComboBox".
Gets the control pattern for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
One of the enumeration values.
If pattern is or , this method returns a reference to the current instance of the ; otherwise, this method calls the base implementation on .
trans-unit.target: 경우 pattern 은 또는 의 현재 인스턴스에 대 한 참조를 반환 하는이 메서드는 , 그렇지 않으면이 메서드를 호출 할 기본 구현을 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard input focus on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref> control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 에 키보드 입력된 포커스를 설정의 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"> </xref> 과 관련 된 컨트롤 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref> control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> object cannot receive focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"> </xref> 과 관련 된 컨트롤 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"> </xref> 개체 포커스를 받을 수 없습니다.
